name: mikroe.click.c4glte2data
short_description: 4G LTE 2 Click is a compact add-on board representing a secure-cloud multi-band solution offering universal connectivity and reliable performance. This board features the LARA-R6001D, the worldâ€™s smallest LTE Cat 1 module with global coverage and a built-in MQTT client from u-blox, representing a data-only solution. Equipped with familiar AT commands set over the UART interface, USB interface, and Network and Status indicators, the LARA-R6001D also has a comprehensive certification scheme, multi-band and multi-mode capabilities providing excellent flexibility, except for the support of voice/audio application.
